Title: Establishes a public safety youth explorer program grants fund
Summary: Establishes a public safety youth explorer program grants fund for the purposes of covering non-payroll expenses associated with hosting youth explorer programs which provide youths with an opportunity to experience working in a public safety field on a part-time temporary basis to get a sense on whether they would like to pursue it as a career.
LawCode: Add ยง99-r, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing a public safety youth explorer program grants fund
